Uses of Package
com.xatkit.core.platform

  • Packages that use com.xatkit.core.platform 
    Package Description
    com.xatkit.core
    Contains the core components of the Xatkit framework.
    com.xatkit.core.platform
    Contains the abstract classes to implement to provide custom platforms.
    com.xatkit.core.platform.action
    Contains the abstract classes to implement to provide custom platform's actions.
    com.xatkit.core.platform.io
    Contains the abstract classes to implement to provide custom platform's input provider.
    com.xatkit.plugins.chat.platform  
    com.xatkit.plugins.chat.platform.action  
    com.xatkit.plugins.core.platform
    Contains the platform implementation of the Xatkit Core plugin.
    com.xatkit.plugins.discord.platform
    Contains the platform implementation of the Xatkit Discord plugin.
    com.xatkit.plugins.giphy.platform  
    com.xatkit.plugins.github.platform
    Contains the platform implementation of the Xatkit Github plugin.
    com.xatkit.plugins.log.platform
    Contains the platform implementation of the Xatkit Log plugin.
    com.xatkit.util
    Utility classes that are used by the Xatkit framework.
  • Classes in com.xatkit.core.platform used by com.xatkit.core 
    Class and Description
    Formatter
    Provides mapping function from execution-level Objects to their String representation.
    RuntimePlatform
    The concrete implementation of a PlatformDefinition.
  • Classes in com.xatkit.core.platform used by com.xatkit.core.platform 
    Class and Description
    RuntimePlatform.EventProviderThread
    The Thread class used to start RuntimeEventProviders.
